TopicTitle: github outage [looks like it's back up now]

Articles.Content:
Anyone else feel the shift in the force as github completely dropped offline?  Thought I'd done something wrong at first, but nope, it was actually borked. Seems to just now be coming back up.

https://status.github.com/
Yes. The software subteam in my FIRST Robotics team was completely caught off guard. We thought it might have been a Wi-Fi issue. I had no idea it was a internet-wide event.
